code: import api from'./api';export const login=async(email,password)=>{const response=await api.post('/login',{username:email,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.access_token);return getCurrentUser();};export const signup=async(name,email,phone,password)=>{await api.post('/signup',{name,email,phone,password});return login(email,password);};export const getCurrentUser=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/me');return response.data;};export const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');};
